snippet.title: MechRunner Announced by Spark Plug Games | E3 2014 | PS4
snippet.description:
MechRunner is a high-octane endless action arcade game that casts you as a powerful mode-changing mech. http://www.mechrunner.com    Blast your way through decimated urban landscapes at incredible speeds while switching between robot and tank modes to rain punishment on endless waves of mechanical foes. MechRunner features exciting, non-stop action, stunning 3D visuals and a Hollywood-style soundtrack.

http://www.mechrunner.com
